kpi_info.title: UE IDENTIFIED AS LFDPHONE
kpi_info.use: The number of times when a UE is identified as Legacy Fast Dormancy Phone based on state transition behaviour. UPDATED: When the RNC identifies a UE as Legacy Fast Dormancy UE based on its state transition behaviour and therefore IMSI is stored for later use. The counter is updated only once per RRC connection. Here "state transition behaviour" means that the UE has sent Signalling Connection Release Indication, the RNC has commanded the UE to PCH state, but instead the UE went to idle state.
